reviews.author: David W.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Their expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

reviews.author: Patricia B.
reviews.content: Extremely professional and knowledgeable about antique valuation. The appraisal was thorough and delivered on time.

reviews.author: Elizabeth J.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.author: Jessica R.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and Able Auctions – Asset Valuation Division delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.author: Nancy R.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.

business.pricing: Appraisal fees vary by collection size and complexity. Contact Artista Art & Antiquités in Kelowna, BR for a tailored quote.

specialties:
Estate jewelry, watches, china, coins, rare books, mid-century home décor.  
- Services: Free walk-in evaluations during business hours + consignment options.  
- Years Active: Operational through at least February 2025[⁶] → [downtownkelowa.com](https://downtownkelowa.com).
